long_description:
Note that "unchanged" will leave the settings unchanged.

Requires a CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible Tektronix scopes (untested):
MDO4xxx, MSO4xxx, and DPO4xxx.
short_description: The TRIGGER_SETTINGS_MDO3XXX node sets advanced trigger settings.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node).

parameters.name: query_set
parameters.description: Whether to query or set the triggering channel.

parameters.name: edge_couplings
parameters.description: Set the trigger edge coupling type.

parameters.name: trigger_types
parameters.description: Set to trigger on edge, logic, or pulses.

parameters.name: edge_slope
parameters.description: Set to trigger on positive, negative, or either slopes.
